title.narrative: Niger Refugees and Host Communities Support Project

description.narrative: The project development objective is to improve access to basic services and economic opportunities for refugees and host communities in select areas of the Republic of Niger.

participating-org.narrative: Executive Secretariat for the SDS Sahel Niger (SE/SDS Sahel-Niger)
